record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - July 30, 2007)

[Page: H8830]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 days to revise and extend their remarks on the 10 measures previously considered.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from the Virgin Islands?
